query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS micro_retreats (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  themeId VARCHAR(128),
  durationMinutes INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 15,
  steps JSON NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_micro_retreat_sessions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  retreatId INT NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  reflectionNotes TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (retreatId) REFERENCES micro_retreats(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
